profileAlternative.name: Joe Lemmer
profileAlternative.headline: Contract Salesforce and JavaScript Developer at Condé Nast International
profileAlternative.summary:
Contract Fullstack JavaScript Developer

Education and Certifications:

Computer Science BSc Hons, University of Bristol
1 x AWS Professional Certification (DevOps Engineer)
3 x AWS Associate Certifications (Solutions Architect, Developer and SysOps Administrator)
Strongloop Certified NodeJS Developer
Oracle Certified Professional Java 6 Programmer

JavaScript

Strong client-side JavaScript - Angular 2/4, AngularJS, TypeScript, RxJS
NodeJS (Strongloop Certified Node Developer), Express.
HTML5, CSS3, SASS, Bootstrap, Bulma.
Build tools – Angular CLI, Webpack, Gulp, Grunt
TDD development – Mocha, Chai, Jasmine, Sinon, Karma.
E2E tests with Protractor, TestCafe

Other Skills

Salesforce (including Apex, VisualForce, Integration, etc)
GIT version control.
MongoDB
PostgreSQL

positions.title: Senior AngularJS and Salesforce Developer (Contract)
positions.description: Built and tested an AngularJS application on the Force.com platform.

given.text:
I have recently had the pleasure of working with Joe. His Salesforce development skills are outstanding, as is his attitude and diligence. I was particularly impressed with his quality of work, ability to prioritise everything thrown at him and communication with end clients and third parties. I will not hesitate to use Joe as a Salesforce contractor again.
…
See more
